metadata.name: Okta Unauthorized Access to App
metadata.comment: Detects when unauthorized access to app occurs.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM user_access WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(message) = lower('user attempted unauthorized access to app'))

output.summary: Detects when unauthorized access to app occurs.

metadata.objective: False positive: User might of believe that they had access. References: https://developer.okta.com/docs/reference/api/system-log/, https://developer.okta.com/docs/reference/api/event-types/
